job.title: Technical Marketing Engineer - Data Center, Network Architect
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
If you are a Technical Marketing Engineer with experience with networking technologies, please read on!
Recognized as one of Americas' fastest-growing companies in 2021, we help clients simplify their technical operations by introducing network automation and distributing data. We allow our clients to gain more visibility across their entire network which enables them to cut costs and leverage open networking hardware.
We are looking for a talented Network Engineer who is strong at solving complex challenges. This person should have an expert-level understanding of Data Center networking. Experience with virtualization platforms would be a great skill.
What You Will Be Doing
Implement technical product requirements with our partners
Prepare design guidelines and reference architecture decks for field use
Develop presentations & demos for pre-sale activities
Properly document product and solution guides
Field training for clients and partners
What You Need for this Position
At least 10+ years of experience and knowledge of:
SDN
Service Providers
Technical Marketing
Network Architecture
Network Engineer
Data Center
Firewalls
Router
Openstack
Kubernetes
So, if you are a Technical Marketing Engineer with experience in Data Center networking, please apply today!
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Ian.Henderson@Optello.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : IH1-1639170 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Ian Henderson - Recruiter - Optello
